title: Why Is a Genius Such as Myself Accepting Apprentices? - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Xianxia
tags: Antihero Protagonist   Cheats   Cultivation   Fast Cultivation   Genius Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Master-Disciple Relationship   Sect Development   System Administrator   Transported to Another World
author: Wood Easily Starts Fires   木下生火
description:
Lu Xiaoran has traveled to a fantasy world and received a system, but the useless system has not been activated for a long time. Lu Xiaoran, who had no choice, could only cultivate in a low-key manner and grow steadily. However, after Lu Xiaoran had become the strongest existence in the entire sect, the dog system suddenly activated.  
 
Lu Xiaoran: Useless system, I have already cultivated myself into a Top level Expert, you can get out of here.  
 
System: Top level Expert? Are you a Great emperor? Are you a Saint? Are you an immortal? Or become the Supreme Being of Creation?  
 
Lu Xiaoran: ....>
